column5: Date:June8,9 2002Place:Sarnia,Ontario,CanadaEvent:2 day total weight(max. 5 fish per day per boat) 6 rods max 1st prize $15,000(can) Tagged fish-$10,000(can)Entry Fee : $200.00(CAN)/BOATFor more info contact Ric Gillesby @ 1-519-862-2291(ext 29) or visit our web site (www.tourneyofchamps.com)
